title: Heidi Klum rocks metal-studded black leather jacket while arriving at AGT: The Champions
text:
She is a judge on America's Got Talent: The Champions.

And Heidi Klum took a stab at biker chic when she was glimpsed arriving at the gig in Los Angeles this Saturday.

The 46-year-old supermodel sensation slung a black leather jacket covered with metallic studs over one shoulder.

Mover and shaker: Heidi Klum took a stab at biker chic when she was glimpsed arriving at her America's Got Talent: The Champions judging gig in Los Angeles this Saturday

Pounding the pavement on a pair of sky-high stilettos, she showed off her vertiginous legs in skintight jeans.

Heidi wore a tee that read: 'New York, Paris, London, Milan, Amazon.'

The shirt was a reference to her new show. Heidi and Tim Gunn have left their judging jobs at Project Runway to develop a new fashion competition series with Amazon called Making The Cut.

Making The Cut began filming in Paris over the summer and is expected to drop at some point next year.

On the go: The 46-year-old supermodel sensation slung a black leather jacket covered with metallic studs over one shoulder

Heidi, who used to be on the panel at the original America's Got Talent, judges The Champions alongside Simon Cowell, Mel B, Howie Mandell and Alesha Dixon.

The German blonde joined America's Got Talent in 2013 for season eight and departed after season thirteen last year.

She is now married to fellow German Tom Kaulitz, a guitarist who helped found the pop rock band Tokio Hotel with his twin brother Bill, its lead singer.

When you got it: Pounding the pavement on a pair of sky-high stilettos, she showed off her vertiginous legs in skintight jeans

Heidi and Tom became a public item last year, and this February he became her third husband with a secret marriage ceremony in Los Angeles.

The dynamic duo had a second wedding aboard the yacht Christina O, named after the late daughter of Greek shipping magnate Aristotle Onassis.

Aristotle, famous for his marriage to Jacqueline Kennedy and affairs with such women as her sister Lee Radziwill, bought the vessel in the early 1950s after its initial use as a warship in the Royal Canadian Navy during World War II.

Before Tom, Heidi was previously married to stylist Ric Pipino from 1997 until 2002, and then to the English singer Seal from 2005 until 2014.

Seal and Heidi share three biological children - Henry, 14, Johan, 12, and Lou, nine - and he also adopted Heidi's now-15-year-old daughter Leni.

Fashion statement: She wore a tee that read: 'New York Paris London Milan Amazon,' naming the four fashion capitals alongside the rainforest beleaguered by fires
